attributes.action: Stop the permission of houses being built on the land behind our mobile homes.
attributes.background: The land put forward for this permission has many uses. Due to the landladys rules several residents park their cars on it. It has badgers foxes and bats living on it. There are hundreds of birds and bird boxes allowing them to nest. There is access issues due to the extra cars that will be there.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
